name: 5mm LED
description: Standard 5mm through-hole LED. Wavelength/color chosen by the agent at design time. Requires a current-limiting resistor. Anode (+) connects to positive supply through resistor, cathode (-) to ground. Forward voltage varies by color: IR ~1.2V, Red ~2.0V, Orange ~2.1V, Yellow ~2.1V, Green ~2.2V, Blue ~3.2V, White ~3.3V, UV ~3.4V.

pins.label: Anode (+)
pins.description: Positive terminal. Connect through current-limiting resistor to V+.

wavelength_nm.description: Wavelength in nm, chosen by agent. Common values: 940 (IR), 620 (red), 590 (yellow), 525 (green), 470 (blue), 400 (UV), or 0 for white

forward_voltage_v.description: Forward voltage corresponding to chosen wavelength. Agent must set consistently: IR=1.2, Red=2.0, Orange=2.1, Yellow=2.1, Green=2.2, Blue=3.2, White=3.3, UV=3.4
